Gripings \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w pains|strong="H2256"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H0270"\w* \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* pain \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* woman \w in|strong="H0413"\w* labour. \w Every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w amazed|strong="H8539"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* neighbour, \w their|strong="H6440"\w* countenances \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* burnt.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* trouble \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w moved|strong="H7264"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* indignation \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* tierce \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* among \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* famous \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4467"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H0853"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord destroyed \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* Gomorrha.

\w It|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* founded unto \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Arabian \w pitch|strong="H0167"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w tents|strong="H0167"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w rest|strong="H7257"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

But wild beasts \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w rest|strong="H7257"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* serpents, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* hairy ones \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w dance|strong="H7540"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* owls \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* there, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* houses thereof, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* sirens \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w temples|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* pleasure.
